author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...KIKO STRENGTHENS BACK TO A CATEGORY 4 HURRICANE OVER THE CENTRAL PACIFIC...
summary: ...KIKO STRENGTHENS BACK TO A CATEGORY 4 HURRICANE OVER THE CENTRAL PACIFIC... As of 3:30 PM HST Sat Sep 06 the center of Kiko was located near 16.5, -142.1 with movement WNW at 12 mph. The minimum central pressure was 947 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 130 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...KIKO STRENGTHENS BACK TO A CATEGORY 4 HURRICANE OVER THE CENTRAL PACIFIC... As of 3:30 PM HST Sat Sep 06 the center of Kiko was located near 16.5, -142.1 with movement WNW at 12 mph. The minimum central pressure was 947 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 130 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Kiko (CP4/EP112025)
